div.div:
Help make Digg better. Take our survey →
×
EXCEL IS THE NEW CRYSTAL BALL

div.a: Predicting The Future Is Easier Than It Looks

div.div: Nate Silver was just the beginning. Some of the same statistical techniques used by America's forecaster-in-chief are about to revolutionize world politics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5PQur&via=Digg&text=Predicting The Future Is Easier Than It Looks

div.a: Man Proposes With R2-D2 Engagement Ring

div.div: Joe and Emily met at a tattoo parlor a few years ago and their love story has culminated in a Star Wars engagement ring.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UMdJKK&via=Digg&text=Man Proposes With R2-D2 Engagement Ring

div.a: Who Do Flight Attendants Consider To Be The Best Passanger?

div.div: From the "unimportant but mildly diverting" category of travel stories comes news that male 30-something Europeans, travelling alone for leisure in economy class make the best passengers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WdJyHL&via=Digg&text=Who Do Flight Attendants Consider To Be The Best Passanger?

div.a: Cigarettes In Australia Will Soon Have To Be Sold In Identical Packs

div.div: Australians call them Winnie Blues. But their favourite cigarettes will lose their familiar blue and white livery under Australia’s new plain-packaging law, which takes effect on December 1st.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SB14Eg&via=Digg&text=Cigarettes In Australia Will Soon Have To Be Sold In Identical Packs

div.a: Russian Roulette -- An Excerpt From 'John McAfee's Last Stand'

div.div: It seemed implausible that a wildly successful tech entrepreneur would disappear into the Central American jungle and become a narco-trafficker. Now I’m not so sure.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UKaDBj&via=Digg&text=Russian Roulette -- An Excerpt From 'John McAfee's Last Stand'

div.a: Where 16 Of The Strangest Company Names Came From

div.div: Some of today's biggest companies are named the strangest things. There's a joke that vowels are too expensive in Silicon Valley and founders can't afford normal-sounding domain names.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XPTmNk&via=Digg&text=Where 16 Of The Strangest Company Names Came From

div.div: Often employing thousands of dollars worth of scratch-off tickets ($70,000 worth of tickets in the last installation alone), the work conjures a culture of hyper-materialism.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PZWDrn&via=Digg&text=Lottery Ticket Art

div.a: Trying To Keep Your E-Mails Secret When The C.I.A. Chief Couldn’t

div.div: In the past, a spymaster might have placed a flower pot with a red flag on his balcony or drawn a mark on page 20 of his mistress’s newspaper. Instead, Mr. Petraeus used Gmail. And he got caught.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZK6O4x&via=Digg&text=Trying To Keep Your E-Mails Secret When The C.I.A. Chief Couldn’t

div.div: SOMEONE GIVE THIS TUBE A MINT

div.a: Does This Test Tube Hold Thomas Edison's Last Breath?

div.div: This standard-issue test tube, held at the Henry Ford Museum, was for years believed to contain Thomas Edison’s last exhalation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TStcon&via=Digg&text=Does This Test Tube Hold Thomas Edison's Last Breath?

div.a: 1946 Walt Disney Menstruation Animation Tells Us We’re Ok Just The Way We Are

div.div: No, this video from 1946 isn’t perfect as far as feminism goes but it's surprising to find it so…not 1946? Though it's even more surprising that Walt Disney Productions made a video about our periods at all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T31CUq&via=Digg&text=1946 Walt Disney Menstruation Animation Tells Us We’re Ok Just The Way We Are

div.a: Dumb Ways To Die, A Cheery PSA By Melbourne’s Metro Trains

div.div: To help stop train-related deaths, Metro Trains in Melbourne, Australia has started a “Dumb Ways to Die” PSA campaign which features a cheery little song by Tangerine Kitty and a cute animated music video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T6dNSu&via=Digg&text=Dumb Ways To Die, A Cheery PSA By Melbourne’s Metro Trains

div.a: It May Be Possible To 'Vaccinate' Against PTSD

div.div: With its deafening explosions, searing fires, dismembered corpses and stench of death, war pushes everyone it touches to the brink. Most recover naturally. Some, though, suffer psychological injuries that do not heal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T56NpP&via=Digg&text=It May Be Possible To 'Vaccinate' Against PTSD

div.div: JUST WHEN YOU THOUGHT THE MEME WAS DEAD

div.a: President Obama And Olympic Gymnast McKayla Maroney Are 'Not Impressed'

div.div: This picture was taken during a visit of the U.S. women’s Olympic team to the White House. Maroney tweeted: “Did I just do the Not Impressed face with the President..?”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S4RwDg&via=Digg&text=President Obama And Olympic Gymnast McKayla Maroney Are 'Not Impressed'

div.div: Memo to donors: Fixing the Republican Party's technology issues will require human capital, not just programs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PZmEFV&via=Digg&text=The GOP Talent Gap

div.a: Why Rich Countries Can't Have $20 Tablets--Yet

div.div: Students in India can now buy a fully-functional 7″ tablet for about $20. But if you live outside the developing world, don’t run down to your local electronics retailer just yet; you can’t get this much functionality at this price.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S3aUjM&via=Digg&text=Why Rich Countries Can't Have $20 Tablets--Yet

div.div: EVERY CLOUD HAS A CREAMY LINING

div.a: Don't Worry, Hostess' Top Executives Still Got Richer As Company Collapsed

div.div: We can all have a happy, stress-free weekend: Hostess executives gave themselves raises up to 300 percent even as they were preparing to file for bankruptcy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T7Rvjg&via=Digg&text=Don't Worry, Hostess' Top Executives Still Got Richer As Company Collapsed

div.a: JFK Worker Busted In $1.9M iPad Mini Heist

div.div: Federal agents were able to nab Renel Rene Richardson because he allegedly made suspicious inquiries to co-workers about the gadget shipment and where forklifts might be found, according to court papers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q0n2E0&via=Digg&text=JFK Worker Busted In $1.9M iPad Mini Heist

div.a: Do We Really Need A Second Inauguration?

div.div: Obama's first inauguration was historic and arguably a meeting-up point for a lost nation. Four years later, we are still trying to get the danged compass to work. Do we really have time (and resources) to party?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XPZG7u&via=Digg&text=Do We Really Need A Second Inauguration?

div.a: Face It, We’re Never Getting Our Hoverboards

div.div: We live in an age of such dazzling technological progress that it can seem at times like absolutely anything is possible. But some things remain out of reach even in these vertiginous times. Like the hoverboard.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVU5rt&via=Digg&text=Face It, We’re Never Getting Our Hoverboards

div.a: Hidden Motivations Of Video Game Characters, In Order

div.div: Why they do the things they do.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVBfk6&via=Digg&text=Hidden Motivations Of Video Game Characters, In Order

div.a: 10 Things Parents Should Know About Nintendo's Wii U

div.div: If you plan to pick up a Wii U system for your family this holiday season, it’s likely that you still have a number of questions about Nintendo’s newest console, and that’s understandable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sy1YS5&via=Digg&text=10 Things Parents Should Know About Nintendo's Wii U

div.div: ALSO FILMED TWO CHAIRS DOING IT

div.a: Meet The Stop-Motion Genius Who Turns Grenades Into 'Fresh Guacamole'

div.div: "The first node of the idea was to use an avocado as a grenade as an avocado. I'd also considered pineapple, but to me, because of its color and texture, a hand grenade always resembled avocado."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wdxu9q&via=Digg&text=Meet The Stop-Motion Genius Who Turns Grenades Into 'Fresh Guacamole'

div.a: Superstorm Hits Australia's East Coast With 4,000 Lightning Strikes In One Hour

div.div: A damaging storm has turned "day into night'' in Brisbane, as lightning and winds brought down powerlines and left more than 6000 homes and businesses without electricity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XLD7AX&via=Digg&text=Superstorm Hits Australia's East Coast With 4,000 Lightning Strikes In One Hour

div.a: How Social Media Is Aiding The Hurricane Sandy Recovery

div.div: Storm-affected residents of Rockaway Beach, Queens, at an Occupy Sandy–operated shelter. Text messaging and Twitter helped direct volunteers and donations to shelters and distribution hubs after the hurricane.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T6aD15&via=Digg&text=How Social Media Is Aiding The Hurricane Sandy Recovery
